parameters.name: AllSubClustersSuccess
parameters.description:
To edit a GlobalView aggregated instance, do you require all passed child instances to be verified successfully before creating a GlobalView instance (optional, default to false):
- true
- false

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. This parameter is required if you set ClusterType to aliyun-cs.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the cluster. This parameter is required if you set ClusterType to remote-write, ecs, or global-view.

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description:
Types include:
- remote-write: General-purpose Instance
- ecs: Prometheus for ECS
- global-view: Global Aggregation Instance
- aliyun-cs: Prometheus Instance for Container Service

parameters.name: GrafanaInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Grafana dedicated instance. This parameter is available if you set ClusterType to ecs.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. If you create a Prometheus instance for a cloud service in China, set this parameter to cn-shanghai.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom resource group. You can specify this parameter to bind the instance to the resource group.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the security group. This parameter is required if you set ClusterType to ecs or create an ASK managed cluster.

parameters.name: SubClustersJson
parameters.description: The child instances of the Prometheus instance for GlobalView. The value is a JSON string.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags of the instance. You can specify this parameter to manage tags for the instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch. This parameter is required if you set ClusterType to ecs or create an ASK managed cluster.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC). This parameter is required if you set ClusterType to ecs or create a serverless Kubernetes (ASK) managed cluster.
